66274.「あら？ 家の中や庭に 何か残ってますよ？\n 屋根ウラ収納 家具＆庭具おきばを:
What? Is there anything left in the house or the garden? You'll need to empty out the roof storage, furniture and garden furniture
storage, and clear out the furniture and garden furniture... Even if you've hired a private concierge, they can't pack up your
house, so you'll have to wait until after you leave to try...

66276.「家でできることについて ご説明します。\n 何について 知りたいですか？\n<:
Let's talk about what you can do at home...
What would you like to know about?<break>

66277.「管理人を呼び 『権限の設定』をすることで\n あなた以外の方に 家の様々な機能:
By calling the administrator and setting permissions, you can open up your house to other people... You can set permissions to
enter and leave the house, install furniture, use furniture functions, etc. However, please be aware that if you make too many functions
public, you may get into trouble...

66278.「家の建て替えとは 場所は変えずに\n 家を 他の家キットに変えることです。\n:
Rebuilding a house means changing the house into another house kit without changing the location... You can rebuild your house with
any house kit that's the same size or smaller... If you rebuild your house, you can return it to the original house kit and use
the same exterior parts...

66279.「家をたたむとは すでに建ってる家を\n 家キットに戻すことです。\n<br>\:
Folding a house is when you take a house that's already been built and put it back into a house kit... Even if you fold a house,
you can still build the original house kit and use the same exterior parts as before... However, if you have furniture or garden
tools in place, or items in the roof storage or furniture and garden tools area, you can't put it back in the house kit...

66280.「外装パーツや 内装パーツを付け替えれば\n この家の見た目を ガラッと変えるこ:
You can completely change the look of this house by changing the exterior and interior components... To change the exterior of the
house... To change the interior, you'll need to select a command from the door menu... However, in order to change a part, you must
first have the necessary material items, and then you must create the part. Once you've created a part, you can change it as many
times as you like... You can also change the color... Please note that you, the owner of the house, are the only one who can create
the parts...

66281.「モーモンバザーを置くと\n 家に 遊びにきてくれた人向けの\n お店を開くこと:
If you have a Mormon Bazaar, you can open a shop for people who come to your house... In the Mormon Bazaar, you can put a price on the
items you put in your storage furniture to sell them. You can set a price for each type of item. Up to 60 types of items can be
sold... If you set a price for an item and put it up for sale, all items of the same type in your storage furniture will become
available for sale! If you don't want to sell items of the same type, please don't put them in your storage furniture, such as in the
storage under the roof or in the storage room! When the items are sold, Mormon will turn into Pink Mormon! When there's nothing
left to sell, he turns scary... Only the owner of the house can collect the proceeds. If you have 999 unclaimed sales, you can't
sell any more items... You can set your Mormon Bazaar privileges under "Privileges"... At first, anyone can...

66282.「土地を所有しているときに 別の土地を買うと\n 新しい土地に 引っ越しできます:
If you own land and buy another piece of land, you can move to the new piece of land. The land you previously owned is automatically
sold. After you move, Zoomstone will be rewritten to the new land and you will be able to use it as you did before. Some of the
exterior parts you have made will be inherited, but some parts are specific to your lot size and will not work on a different lot
size. In the "Move to a cleared lot" case, the house will be returned to the house kit and all the furnishings in the "Placed
furnishings" section of the door menu will be cleared out and yellowed. In this case, you can place the furniture again from "Evacuated
furniture" and put it back in the "Furniture & garden furniture storage" from "Clear Evacuated Furniture". However, you will not be
able to place new furniture until all yellow furniture has been placed or cleared. If you have hired a private concierge, please tell
him or her where to place the furniture again in the "Concierge Settings" after you move. If the size of the house on the previous lot is
less than or equal to the size of the new lot, you can "Move In". If you choose "Move In", you can keep your house kit and furniture and
garden furniture as they are. If the house before moving was set to Team House, the assembly hall setting will be automatically
removed when you move. However, if there are Sakas in the underfloor aquarium or companion monsters in the garden, or if the
house is being cultivated in the field, you cannot move in.

66283.「郵便ポストを 庭に置くと\n ポストから 手紙や荷物を送ったり\n 受け取った:
When you place a Mailbox in your yard, you can send and receive letters and packages from your mailbox. The letters and packages that
can be received at the mailbox are the same as those received at the Post Office. The mailbox has "Receive", "Send", and "Receive Sales"
options, but only the owner of the house can use the mailbox. However, authorized users can send letters and packages to the owner of the
house by putting them directly into the mailbox. If you want to change the permission, you can set it from "Use Mailbox" in the
permission settings of the administrator menu. In the "View P.O. Box" section, you can view some of the letters sent to adventurers, such
as seasonal events and limited-time event announcements.

66284.「住宅素材屋に売っている\n カカシつきの畑を設置し タネをまくことで\n 花を:
Scarecrow Fields sold at the Housing Material Shop can be set up to grow flowers by sowing seeds. Only one Scarecrow Field can be set up
per house, even in My Town. If you sow one seed, you will have sown the same type of seed in the entire field, and a total of eight
seeds will sprout. You can also increase the amount of flowers by watering the field and using fertilizers. You can use "Cowpat" or
"Horse Manure" as fertilizer. You can use only one fertilizer per person per day. You can use water and fertilizer for your own fields as
well as for other people's fields. The same seed will produce different types of flowers and different yields depending on the number
of times you use fertilizer and the number of people who water the seed.

66285.「家の中には 自由に家具を置くことができます。\n 家具によっては 配置すること:
You can put furniture in your house. Some furniture can be used for special functions... For example, a chest of drawers
will allow you to store items, a bed will allow you to rest and recover HP and MP... You can also install artisanal equipment,
allowing you to perform artisanal tasks such as production and alchemy...

66286.「屋根ウラ収納とは 家のオーナー専用の\n アイテム倉庫です。この家の 屋根ウラ:
Roof storage is an item that is reserved for the homeowner's... The roof storage of this house Only you can get in and out... To use it, select the "Roof storage" command from the door menu in the house or from the storage
area... The roof storage in this house can hold up to <%dL_VAULT_SLOTS> types...

66287.「ウェルカムハウスに 設定すると\n たくさんの人が この家を見つけて\n 遊び:
If you set up a welcome house, a lot of people might find this house and come to visit... In the welcome house, you can set up
your house's self-confidence points, and for each self-confidence point you set up, you can select the house you want to fly to...
The welcome house can be accessed from the door menu, and balloons will be placed on the sign outside the house, so that other people
can easily see... If you set your house as a welcome house, it will automatically be open to everyone, so be careful when setting
permissions on furniture...

66341.「郵便ポストを 庭に置くと\n ポストから 手紙や荷物を送ったり\n 受け取った:
When you place a Mailbox in your yard, you can send and receive letters and packages from your mailbox. The letters and packages that
can be received at the mailbox are the same as those received at the Post Office. The mailbox has "Receive", "Send", and "Receive Sales"
options, but only the owner of the house can use the mailbox. However, authorized users can send letters and packages to the owner of the
house by putting them directly into the mailbox. If you want to change the permission, you can set it from "Use Mailbox" in the
permission settings of the administrator menu. In the "View P.O. Box" section, you can view some of the letters sent to adventurers, such
as seasonal events and limited-time event announcements.

66342.「住宅素材屋に売っている\n カカシつきの畑を設置し タネをまくことで\n 花を:
Scarecrow Fields sold at the Housing Material Shop can be set up to grow flowers by sowing seeds. Only one Scarecrow Field can be set up
per house, even in My Town. If you sow one seed, you will have sown the same type of seed in the entire field, and a total of eight
seeds will sprout. You can also increase the amount of flowers by watering the field and using fertilizers. You can use "Cowpat" or
"Horse Manure" as fertilizer. You can use only one fertilizer per person per day. You can use water and fertilizer for your own fields as
well as for other people's fields. The same seed will produce different types of flowers and different yields depending on the number
of times you use fertilizer and the number of people who water the seed.

66343.「家の中には 自由に家具を置くことができます。\n 家具によっては 配置すること:
You can put furniture in your house. Some furniture can be used for special functions... For example, a chest of drawers
will allow you to store items, a bed will allow you to rest and recover HP and MP... You can also install artisanal equipment,
allowing you to perform artisanal tasks such as production and alchemy...

66344.「屋根ウラ収納とは 家のオーナー専用の\n アイテム倉庫です。この家の 屋根ウラ:
Roof storage is an item that is reserved for the homeowner's... The roof storage of this house Only you can get in and out... To use it, select the "Roof storage" command from the door menu in the house or from the storage
area... The roof storage in this house can hold up to <%dL_VAULT_SLOTS> types...

66345.「ウェルカムハウスに 設定すると\n たくさんの人が この家を見つけて\n 遊び:
If you set up a welcome house, a lot of people might find this house and come to visit... In the welcome house, you can set up
your house's self-confidence points, and for each self-confidence point you set up, you can select the house you want to fly to...
The welcome house can be accessed from the door menu, and balloons will be placed on the sign outside the house, so that other people
can easily see... If you set your house as a welcome house, it will automatically be open to everyone, so be careful when setting
permissions on furniture...

66350.「家の建て替えとは 場所は変えずに\n 家を 他の家キットに変えることです。\n:
Rebuilding a house means changing the house into another house kit without changing the location... You can rebuild your house with
any house kit that's the same size or smaller... If you rebuild your house, you can return it to the original house kit, and it
will still have the same exterior parts... So, which house would you like to rebuild?

be placed not only from the menu of doors, but also from the menu of objects to be used...

84581.「モンスターのおうちを 置くと\n 仲間モンスターを お庭にはなすことが\n で:
When you place a monster house, you can release your monsters into the garden... If you release a companion monster into the
monster house, it will not leave your party... And if you release a companion monster, it can be petted by others while
you're adventuring... When you release a companion monster to the garden, you can choose to have it stay in the monster's house
or take it for a walk around the neighborhood. You can also pet the monsters in your monster house... You can also pet
other people's companion monsters... The number of times a fellow monster is petted, the master will receive a gift in return.
Let's pet them all!

85726.「水そうや マルチ水そう\n 床下水そう用ハッチを置くと\n 釣ったさかなを 家:
You can place an aquarium or a multi- aquariumFloor Aquarium Hatch in your house to display the fish you have caught. The number
of fish that can be placed in an aquarium depends on the size of the aquarium. A maximum of 10 aquariums of any size may be placed in a
single house. A multi-aquarium can contain up to one fish per house and up to five fish of any size. There are five different aquarium
floors. You need "Floor Aquarium Hatch" of furniture to put fish in the aquarium floor. Only the owner of the house can put in and out
fish in the aquarium, and anyone can see the information of the fish in the aquarium.

88338.「チームのリーダーとサブリーダーが\n 自分の家を チーム集会所に\n 設定でき:
Team leaders and sub-leaders can now set their own homes as team meeting places! Only members who have permission to set up a team
meeting place will be able to see the "Set up Team Meeting Place" option in the manager menu... Once you've set up a Team Gathering
Place, you'll be able to go to it from the Team menu and click "Go to Gathering Place" even if you don't have a Zoomstone. You can
cancel the team meeting place setting at any time... If you set up another house as a meeting place, it will overwrite the one you
set up... Also, if the house you've set as your team's meeting place is moved or abandoned, it will automatically unset as
your meeting place...

enter and leave the house, install furniture, use furniture functions, etc. However, please be aware that if you make too many functions
public, you may get into trouble...

248794.「貯金箱を 家に置くと\n 家からゴールド銀行に お金を預けたり\n 引き出すこ:
A piggy bank in your house is a way of depositing and withdrawing money from your house into the Gold Bank... The piggy bank
can only be used by the owner of the house... No one but the owner can touch the money...

248795.「家の建て替えとは 場所は変えずに\n 家を 他の家キットに変えることです。\n:
Rebuilding a house means changing the house into another house kit without changing the location... You can rebuild your house with
any house kit that's the same size or smaller... If you rebuild your house, you can return it to the original house kit and use
the same exterior parts...

248796.「家をたたむとは すでに建ってる家を\n 家キットに戻すことです。\n<br>\:
Folding a house is when you take a house that's already been built and put it back into a house kit... Even if you fold the
house, you can still build the original house kit and use the same exterior parts as before... However, if there is garden
furniture on the property, or if the house has its own furniture, you can't put it back in the house kit. Furniture that was in the
house can be placed again under "Furniture in progress"...

248797.「外装パーツや 内装パーツを付け替えれば\n この家の見た目を ガラッと変えるこ:
You can completely change the look of this house by changing the exterior and interior components... To change the exterior of the
house... To change the interior, you'll need to select a command from the door menu... However, in order to change a part, you must
first have the necessary material items, and then you must create the part. Once you've created a part, you can change it as many
times as you like... You can also change the color... Please note that you, the owner of the house, are the only one who can create
the parts...

248798.「きせかえドール設定では\n お持ちになっている きせかえドールの\n 種族を:
In the Kisekae doll settings, you can change the race of the Kisekae doll you have. To change the race, go to the Kisekae doll
settings, select one of the Kisekae dolls in the "Things to use" section, and choose the race you want... If you have a <%sM_ticket>,
you can change it to another race...

248799.「モーモンバザーを置くと\n 家に 遊びにきてくれた人向けの\n お店を開くこと:
If you have a Mormon Bazaar, you can open a shop for people who come to your house... In the Mormon Bazaar, you can put a price on the
items you put in your storage furniture to sell them. You can set a price for each type of item. Up to 60 types of items can be
sold... If you set a price for an item and put it up for sale, all items of the same type in your storage furniture will become
available for sale! If you don't want to sell items of the same type, please don't put them in your storage furniture, such as in the
storage under the roof or in the storage room! When the items are sold, Mormon will turn into Pink Mormon! When there's nothing
left to sell, he turns scary... Only the owner of the house can collect the proceeds. If you have 999 unclaimed sales, you can't
sell any more items... You can set your Mormon Bazaar privileges under "Privileges"... At first, anyone can...

248800.「モンスターのおうちを 置くと\n 仲間モンスターを お庭にはなすことが\n で:
When you place a monster house, you can release your monsters into the garden... If you release a companion monster into the
monster house, it will not leave your party... And if you release a companion monster, it can be petted by others while
you're adventuring... When you release a companion monster to the garden, you can choose to have it stay in the monster's house
or take it for a walk around the neighborhood. You can also pet the monsters in your monster house... You can also pet
other people's companion monsters... The number of times a fellow monster is petted, the master will receive a gift in return.
Let's pet them all!

248801.「コンシェルジュからの酒場の説明\n<bw_break>:
Description of the tavern from the concierge
<bw_break>

248802.「土地を所有している時に 別の土地を買うと\n 新しい土地に 引っ越しできます。:
If you buy another piece of land when you own it, you can move to the new piece of land, and if you move out of My Town, you will not lose
your My Town Deed, but no one but yourself will be able to enter the new piece of land. After you move, your Zoomstone will be
rewritten to the new location and you will be able to use it as before. The exterior parts you have made will be inherited, but some
parts are specific to your land size and cannot be used on a different size land. In the "Move to a cleared lot" case, the house
will be returned to the house kit, and all the furnishings in the "Placed furnishings" section of the door menu will be cleared out
and marked in yellow. In this case, you can place the furniture again from "Evacuated furniture" and put it back into "Furniture &
garden furniture storage" from "Clear Evacuated Furniture". However, you cannot place new furniture until you have placed or
cleared out all the yellow furniture. The furniture and all garden furniture placed in the other house will be stored in the
"Temporary storage bag" in the door menu, but the replica furniture and garden furniture will disappear. You will not be able to place
new garden furniture or enter the house while the furniture and garden furniture are in the "temporary storage bag". If you have hired a
private concierge, you will need to reassign him or her to a new position in the "Concierge Settings" after you move. If your house was
set to Team House before you moved in, the assembly hall setting will be automatically removed when you move in.
However, if there are fish in the underfloor aquarium or companion monsters in the garden, or if you are growing crops in
the field, you will not be able to move in.

248803.「お招きのつばさとは ルーラストーンのように\n <pc>さまの家まで 一瞬で移:
Wings of invitation, like a rouleus stone I can get you to your house in an instant. Ten uses for one... You can buy one from the caretaker or from a sign on the house for 500
gold. You can give it to others, but you can't give it to the Traveler's Bazaar. If you move after you've purchased the Wings of
Invitation, you'll be moved to the address you had when you bought it.

248804.「郵便ポストを 庭に置くと\n ポストから 手紙や荷物を送ったり\n 受け取った:
When you place a Mailbox in your yard, you can send and receive letters and packages from your mailbox. The letters and packages that
can be received at the mailbox are the same as those received at the Post Office. The mailbox has "Receive", "Send", and "Receive Sales"
options, but only the owner of the house can use the mailbox. However, authorized users can send letters and packages to the owner of the
house by putting them directly into the mailbox. If you want to change the permission, you can set it from "Use Mailbox" in the
permission settings of the administrator menu. In the "View P.O. Box" section, you can view some of the letters sent to adventurers, such
as seasonal events and limited-time event announcements.

248805.「プライベートコンシェルジュを雇うと\n 旅のコンシェルジュと モンスター酒場の:
When you hire a Private Concierge, you'll be able to use some of the features of the Travel Concierge and the Monster Tavern...
First, you'll be able to receive Support Gold and Casino Tokens from your Private Concierge... You'll also be able to exchange
your Genki-dama and Tokkun Genki-dama from the Private Concierge... Please note that this service is only available to those who
can train... Please note that... As part of the Monster Tavern functions, you can now use "Take Me Out", "Give Me Away", "Monster
Farm", and "Dress Up Goods"...

248806.「住宅素材屋に売っている\n カカシつきの畑を設置し タネをまくことで\n 花を:
Scarecrow Fields sold at the Housing Material Shop can be set up to grow flowers by sowing seeds. Only one Scarecrow Field can be set up
per house, even in My Town. If you sow one seed, you will have sown the same type of seed in the entire field, and a total of eight
seeds will sprout. You can also increase the amount of flowers by watering the field and using fertilizers. You can use "Cowpat" or
"Horse Manure" as fertilizer. You can use only one fertilizer per person per day. You can use water and fertilizer for your own fields as
well as for other people's fields. The same seed will produce different types of flowers and different yields depending on the number
of times you use fertilizer and the number of people who water the seed.

248807.「家の中には 自由に家具を置くことができます。\n 家具によっては 配置すること:
You can put furniture in your house. Some furniture can be used for special functions... For example, a chest of drawers
will allow you to store items, a bed will allow you to rest and recover HP and MP... You can also install artisanal equipment,
allowing you to perform artisanal tasks such as production and alchemy...

248808.「屋根ウラ収納とは 家のオーナー専用の\n アイテム倉庫です。この家の 屋根ウラ:
Roof storage is an item that is reserved for the homeowner's... The roof storage of this house Only you can get in and out... To use it, select the "Roof storage" command from the door menu in the house or from the storage
area... The roof storage in this house can hold up to <%dL_VAULT_SLOTS> types...

248809.「水そうや マルチ水そう\n 床下水そう用ハッチを置くと\n 釣ったさかなを 家:
You can place an aquarium or a multi- aquariumFloor Aquarium Hatch in your house to display the fish you have caught. The number
of fish that can be placed in an aquarium depends on the size of the aquarium. A maximum of 10 aquariums of any size may be placed in a
single house. A multi-aquarium can contain up to one fish per house and up to five fish of any size. There are five different aquarium
floors. You need "Floor Aquarium Hatch" of furniture to put fish in the aquarium floor. Only the owner of the house can put in and out
fish in the aquarium, and anyone can see the information of the fish in the aquarium.

248810.「ウェルカムハウスに 設定すると\n たくさんの人が この家を見つけて\n 遊び:
If you set up a welcome house, a lot of people might find this house and come to visit... In the welcome house, you can set up
your house's self-confidence points, and for each self-confidence point you set up, you can select the house you want to fly to...
The welcome house can be accessed from the door menu, and balloons will be placed on the sign outside the house, so that other people
can easily see... If you set your house as a welcome house, it will automatically be open to everyone, so be careful when setting
permissions on furniture...

248812.『家具カタログ』『庭具カタログ』から\n持っていない家具・庭具でも 配置して\n:
You can now place and view furniture and garden furniture that you do not own from the "Furniture Catalog" and "Garden Furniture
Catalog"! You can view the "furniture catalog" from inside the house and the "garden furniture catalog" from the garden. You can
buy the items you have tried out from the bazaar as they are. The purchased items will be put in your item bag. In addition, you can
now "touch" the items in the "furniture catalog" and "garden furniture catalog"! You can also view the state of the item when you
touch it, so please try it out! We hope you will enjoy a more wonderful housing life with our catalogs!

248825.「チームのリーダーとサブリーダーが\n 自分の家を チーム集会所に\n 設定でき:
Team leaders and sub-leaders can now set their own homes as team meeting places! Only members who have permission to set up a team
meeting place will be able to see the "Set up Team Meeting Place" option in the manager menu... Once you've set up a Team Gathering
Place, you'll be able to go to it from the Team menu and click "Go to Gathering Place" even if you don't have a Zoomstone. You can
cancel the team meeting place setting at any time... If you set up another house as a meeting place, it will overwrite the one you
set up... Also, if the house you've set as your team's meeting place is moved or abandoned, it will automatically unset as
your meeting place...

any house kit that's the same size or smaller... If you rebuild your house, you can return it to the original house kit, and it
will still have the same exterior parts... So, which house would you like to rebuild?

249463.「家でできることについて ご説明します。\n 何について 知りたいですか？\n<:

What would you like to know about?<break>

249464.「管理人を呼び 『権限の設定』をすることで\n あなた以外の方に 家の様々な機能:
By calling the administrator and setting permissions, you can open up your house to other people... You can set permissions to
enter and leave the house, install furniture, use furniture functions, etc. However, please be aware that if you make too many functions
public, you may get into trouble...

249465.「貯金箱を 家に置くと\n 家からゴールド銀行に お金を預けたり\n 引き出すこ:
A piggy bank in your house is a way of depositing and withdrawing money from your house into the Gold Bank... The piggy bank
can only be used by the owner of the house... No one but the owner can touch the money...

249466.「家の建て替えとは 場所は変えずに\n 家を 他の家キットに変えることです。\n:
Rebuilding a house means changing the house into another house kit without changing the location... You can rebuild your house with
any house kit that's the same size or smaller... If you rebuild your house, you can return it to the original house kit and use
the same exterior parts...

249467.「家をたたむとは すでに建ってる家を\n 家キットに戻すことです。\n<br>\:
Folding a house is when you take a house that's already been built and put it back into a house kit... Even if you fold the
house, you can still build the original house kit and use the same exterior parts as before... However, if there is garden
furniture on the property, or if the house has its own furniture, you can't put it back in the house kit. Furniture that was in the
house can be placed again under "Furniture in progress"...

249468.「外装パーツや 内装パーツを付け替えれば\n この家の見た目を ガラッと変えるこ:
You can completely change the look of this house by changing the exterior and interior components... To change the exterior of the
house... To change the interior, you'll need to select a command from the door menu... However, in order to change a part, you must
first have the necessary material items, and then you must create the part. Once you've created a part, you can change it as many
times as you like... You can also change the color... Please note that you, the owner of the house, are the only one who can create
the parts...

249469.「きせかえドール設定では\n お持ちになっている きせかえドールの\n 種族を:
In the Kisekae doll settings, you can change the race of the Kisekae doll you have. To change the race, go to the Kisekae doll
settings, select one of the Kisekae dolls in the "Things to use" section, and choose the race you want... If you have a <%sM_ticket>,
you can change it to another race...

249470.「モーモンバザーを置くと\n 家に 遊びにきてくれた人向けの\n お店を開くこと:
If you have a Mormon Bazaar, you can open a shop for people who come to your house... In the Mormon Bazaar, you can put a price on the
items you put in your storage furniture to sell them. You can set a price for each type of item. Up to 60 types of items can be
sold... If you set a price for an item and put it up for sale, all items of the same type in your storage furniture will become
available for sale! If you don't want to sell items of the same type, please don't put them in your storage furniture, such as in the
storage under the roof or in the storage room! When the items are sold, Mormon will turn into Pink Mormon! When there's nothing
left to sell, he turns scary... Only the owner of the house can collect the proceeds. If you have 999 unclaimed sales, you can't
sell any more items... You can set your Mormon Bazaar privileges under "Privileges"... At first, anyone can...

249471.「モンスターのおうちを 置くと\n 仲間モンスターを お庭にはなすことが\n で:
When you place a monster house, you can release your monsters into the garden... If you release a companion monster into the
monster house, it will not leave your party... And if you release a companion monster, it can be petted by others while
you're adventuring... When you release a companion monster to the garden, you can choose to have it stay in the monster's house
or take it for a walk around the neighborhood. You can also pet the monsters in your monster house... You can also pet
other people's companion monsters... The number of times a fellow monster is petted, the master will receive a gift in return.
Let's pet them all!

249472.「コンシェルジュからの酒場の説明\n<bw_break>:
Description of the tavern from the concierge
<bw_break>

249473.「土地を所有している時に 別の土地を買うと\n 新しい土地に 引っ越しできます。:
If you buy another piece of land when you own it, you can move to the new piece of land, and if you move out of My Town, you will not lose
your My Town Deed, but no one but yourself will be able to enter the new piece of land. After you move, your Zoomstone will be
rewritten to the new location and you will be able to use it as before. The exterior parts you have made will be inherited, but some
parts are specific to your land size and cannot be used on a different size land. In the "Move to a cleared lot" case, the house
will be returned to the house kit, and all the furnishings in the "Placed furnishings" section of the door menu will be cleared out
and marked in yellow. In this case, you can place the furniture again from "Evacuated furniture" and put it back into "Furniture &
garden furniture storage" from "Clear Evacuated Furniture". However, you cannot place new furniture until you have placed or
cleared out all the yellow furniture. The furniture and all garden furniture placed in the other house will be stored in the
"Temporary storage bag" in the door menu, but the replica furniture and garden furniture will disappear. You will not be able to place
new garden furniture or enter the house while the furniture and garden furniture are in the "temporary storage bag". If you have hired a
private concierge, you will need to reassign him or her to a new position in the "Concierge Settings" after you move. If your house was
set to Team House before you moved in, the assembly hall setting will be automatically removed when you move in.
However, if there are fish in the underfloor aquarium or companion monsters in the garden, or if you are growing crops in
the field, you will not be able to move in.

249474.「お招きのつばさとは ルーラストーンのように\n <pc>さまの家まで 一瞬で移:
Wings of invitation, like a rouleus stone I can get you to your house in an instant. Ten uses for one... You can buy one from the caretaker or from a sign on the house for 500
gold. You can give it to others, but you can't give it to the Traveler's Bazaar. If you move after you've purchased the Wings of
Invitation, you'll be moved to the address you had when you bought it.

249475.「郵便ポストを 庭に置くと\n ポストから 手紙や荷物を送ったり\n 受け取った:
When you place a Mailbox in your yard, you can send and receive letters and packages from your mailbox. The letters and packages that
can be received at the mailbox are the same as those received at the Post Office. The mailbox has "Receive", "Send", and "Receive Sales"
options, but only the owner of the house can use the mailbox. However, authorized users can send letters and packages to the owner of the
house by putting them directly into the mailbox. If you want to change the permission, you can set it from "Use Mailbox" in the
permission settings of the administrator menu. In the "View P.O. Box" section, you can view some of the letters sent to adventurers, such
as seasonal events and limited-time event announcements.

249476.「プライベートコンシェルジュを雇うと\n 旅のコンシェルジュと モンスター酒場の:
When you hire a Private Concierge, you'll be able to use some of the features of the Travel Concierge and the Monster Tavern...
First, you'll be able to receive Support Gold and Casino Tokens from your Private Concierge... You'll also be able to exchange
your Genki-dama and Tokkun Genki-dama from the Private Concierge... Please note that this service is only available to those who
can train... Please note that... As part of the Monster Tavern functions, you can now use "Take Me Out", "Give Me Away", "Monster
Farm", and "Dress Up Goods"...

249477.「住宅素材屋に売っている\n カカシつきの畑を設置し タネをまくことで\n 花を:
Scarecrow Fields sold at the Housing Material Shop can be set up to grow flowers by sowing seeds. Only one Scarecrow Field can be set up
per house, even in My Town. If you sow one seed, you will have sown the same type of seed in the entire field, and a total of eight
seeds will sprout. You can also increase the amount of flowers by watering the field and using fertilizers. You can use "Cowpat" or
"Horse Manure" as fertilizer. You can use only one fertilizer per person per day. You can use water and fertilizer for your own fields as
well as for other people's fields. The same seed will produce different types of flowers and different yields depending on the number
of times you use fertilizer and the number of people who water the seed.

249478.「家の中には 自由に家具を置くことができます。\n 家具によっては 配置すること:
You can put furniture in your house. Some furniture can be used for special functions... For example, a chest of drawers
will allow you to store items, a bed will allow you to rest and recover HP and MP... You can also install artisanal equipment,
allowing you to perform artisanal tasks such as production and alchemy...

249479.「屋根ウラ収納とは 家のオーナー専用の\n アイテム倉庫です。この家の 屋根ウラ:
Roof storage is an item that is reserved for the homeowner's... The roof storage of this house Only you can get in and out... To use it, select the "Roof storage" command from the door menu in the house or from the storage
area... The roof storage in this house can hold up to <%dL_VAULT_SLOTS> types...

249480.「水そうや マルチ水そう\n 床下水そう用ハッチを置くと\n 釣ったさかなを 家:
You can place an aquarium or a multi- aquariumFloor Aquarium Hatch in your house to display the fish you have caught. The number
of fish that can be placed in an aquarium depends on the size of the aquarium. A maximum of 10 aquariums of any size may be placed in a
single house. A multi-aquarium can contain up to one fish per house and up to five fish of any size. There are five different aquarium
floors. You need "Floor Aquarium Hatch" of furniture to put fish in the aquarium floor. Only the owner of the house can put in and out
fish in the aquarium, and anyone can see the information of the fish in the aquarium.

249481.「ウェルカムハウスに 設定すると\n たくさんの人が この家を見つけて\n 遊び:
If you set up a welcome house, a lot of people might find this house and come to visit... In the welcome house, you can set up
your house's self-confidence points, and for each self-confidence point you set up, you can select the house you want to fly to...
The welcome house can be accessed from the door menu, and balloons will be placed on the sign outside the house, so that other people
can easily see... If you set your house as a welcome house, it will automatically be open to everyone, so be careful when setting
permissions on furniture...

249483.『家具カタログ』『庭具カタログ』から\n持っていない家具・庭具でも 配置して\n:
You can now place and view furniture and garden furniture that you do not own from the "Furniture Catalog" and "Garden Furniture
Catalog"! You can view the "furniture catalog" from inside the house and the "garden furniture catalog" from the garden. You can
buy the items you have tried out from the bazaar as they are. The purchased items will be put in your item bag. In addition, you can
now "touch" the items in the "furniture catalog" and "garden furniture catalog"! You can also view the state of the item when you
touch it, so please try it out! We hope you will enjoy a more wonderful housing life with our catalogs!

249496.「チームのリーダーとサブリーダーが\n 自分の家を チーム集会所に\n 設定でき:
Team leaders and sub-leaders can now set their own homes as team meeting places! Only members who have permission to set up a team
meeting place will be able to see the "Set up Team Meeting Place" option in the manager menu... Once you've set up a Team Gathering
Place, you'll be able to go to it from the Team menu and click "Go to Gathering Place" even if you don't have a Zoomstone. You can
cancel the team meeting place setting at any time... If you set up another house as a meeting place, it will overwrite the one you
set up... Also, if the house you've set as your team's meeting place is moved or abandoned, it will automatically unset as
your meeting place...

282005.家具を１個 加工することで その家具を\n配置上限数以内なら 好きなだけ配置でき:
By processing one piece of furniture, you can place as many replica furniture as you like within the maximum number of furniture! You
can choose to process the furniture from "Items", "Itemwarehouse", "Furniture & Garden furniture storage", or "Furniture in the
process of being placed". Select the destination from "Process" and check the checkbox of the furniture you want to make
into a replica. If you make a replica furniture, it will be removed from "Items", "Itemwarehouse", and "Furniture & garden
furniture storage". In the case of "furniture in place", the selected furniture will disappear and a replica furniture will be
placed in the same position. Replicas cannot be made from the "Evacuated furniture" in "Placed furniture" when moving or rebuilding,
and must be placed from "Place replica furniture" in "Housing" in the item menu or from "Replica furniture" in the door menu.
Please place the replica furniture. Also, if you put replica furniture, it will not return to items and cannot be stored in furniture &
garden furniture storage or storage. Replica furniture cannot be placed in someone else's home. They cannot be traded, sold, or bought.
Some furniture cannot be made into replicas. You cannot make a replica furniture if it does not have a Wardrobe icon in the "See More"
section. Black Wardrobe icons are the ones that can be made into replicas. A white Wardrobe icon indicates a furniture that can
be made into a replica. Replica furniture will have a white Wardrobe mark in the "Furniture in Placement" section, and requires the
"Replica Processor" available at the Furniture Shop or Realty.

282006.庭具を１個 加工することで その庭具を\n配置上限数以内なら 好きなだけ配置でき:
By processing one garden furniture, you can place as many replica garden furniture as you like within the maximum number of garden
furniture! You can choose where to process from "items", "Itemwarehouse", "furniture & garden furniture storage", and "garden
furniture in place". Select the destination from "Process" and check the checkbox of the garden furniture you want to make a replica.
If you make replica garden furniture, it will be removed from "Items", "Itemwarehouse", and "Furniture & garden furniture storage". In the
case of "Garden furniture in place", the selected garden furniture will disappear and a replica garden furniture will be placed in the
same position. Replicas cannot be made from the "Evicted garden furniture" of the "Placed garden furniture" when moving or rebuilding,
but can be placed from the "Place replica garden furniture" in the "Housing" menu of the "item" menu or the "Replica garden furniture"
in the "Door" menu. Please place replica garden furniture from "Place replica garden furniture" in the "Housing" menu of the item
menu or "Replica garden furniture" in the door menu. If you put replica garden furniture, it will not return to "items" and cannot be
stored in "furniture & garden furniture storage" or "storage". Replica garden furniture cannot be placed in someone else's
home. It cannot be traded or sold. Some garden furniture cannot be made into replicas. If there is no Wardrobe icon in the "See More"
section, it cannot be made into a replica garden furniture. Black Wardrobe icons are garden furniture that can be made into
replicas. White Wardrobe icons are garden furniture that can be made into replicas. Replica garden furniture will have a white
Wardrobe mark in the "Garden furniture in place" section, and requires the "Replica Processor (G)" sold in the Garden Shop or
Realty.

285912.「このたび 『住宅村にいる人の優先表示』の\n 機能が 入りました！\n<br>:
We're pleased to announce that we've added a new feature called "Priority Display of People in Your Housing Village"! You can
choose who you want to see in your village... You can choose who you want to see in your village, and use it for events... You and a
limited number of others can choose who you want to see in your village. You and a select group of friends or team members will be
shown to others with priority... It's a setting that gives you priority when the game is busy, but it doesn't mean you'll always
see them. Depending on the situation, it may not be displayed... Also, if you have set the adventurers around you to "Hide" in the
Delivery Settings, the "Priority display for people in residential villages" setting will not work... To change this setting, go to
What Now? Settings, select "During distribution" and set the adventurers around you to "Show"...

304951.新たに『マイハウス・マイガーデン』が\n使えるようになりました！\n機能の説明で:
We are pleased to announce the introduction of a brand new feature: My House and My Garden! Here is a run down.
You can register currently placed furniture as a set, and you can rearrange any furniture registered in this way.
In the case of a My House, the house kit used must match.
For a My Garden, the house kit, residential area type, and plot size must all match.
For a My Town, you cannot place a My Garden set in a different housing area from the one you initially registered.
When repositioning registered furniture, you can choose to place them as is or combine them with any current placed furniture.
"Normal Placement" causes any currently placed furniture to go to Furniture Storage, and any replicas will be removed.
"Combined Placement" causes your currently placed furniture to remain as is, with the registered furniture placed alongside it.
Even if registered, unless already placed, you cannot place if you don't have any open slots in your Furniture Storage.
Replicas are not subject to this restriction.
Furniture with placement restrictions cannot be registered in a My House or My Garden. (Trophies, Sanguini Bazaar, etc.)

Placement" section, even if they are not currently placed.

The "Interfering Furniture" setting has been added!
You can now choose whether to show or hide outdoor furniture that interferes with your property.

This setting also applies to others who choose to walk onto your property.
Alternatively, selecting "Show" will keep the furniture visible as normal.
Please note that the visibility of interfering furniture may differ between you and others who enter your property.
